overview: Sultry Sandra Julien stars as a teenage virgin who is traumatized after being raped by her 2 "friends", a young man and his sister, leaving her with no interest in sex. Discouraged, she embarks on a journey of sexual awakening in hopes of curing herself.
tagline: SHE WAS HOT ICE... Learn How She Melts...
title: I Am Frigid...Why?
